title: In The Trenches
description: The team heads into the city for medical supplies and are shocked by what they find in the sleepy town of Battle Ground.  Hybrids scavenge the countryside for humans. Their hunger knows no end. The cravings are driving them absolutely mad. Lindsey has made a promise to herself, "I will taste Brother Paul's flesh."  The man's faith will be pushed to its ultimate limits while he fights harder than ever to survive another day.  Bad luck continues to haunt Jim and Karen as they find themselves in crosshairs of this new threat. The couple must summon their courage if they wish to survive the sadistic clutches of these cunning monsters.
author: Joseph Zuko
